Package ussr.comm

An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PacketReceivedObserver Observer interface for reacting to packet reception.
Receiver A device that can receive packets from some transmission source.
Transmitter A device that can transmit packets to some receiver device.
 

Class Summary
GenericReceiver An abstract implementation of the Receiver interface.
GenericTransmitter An abstract implementation of the Transmitter interface.
IRReceiver An infrared receiver, which in currently means that it has a spreading angle of 30 degrees.
IRTransmitter An infrared transmitter, which in means that it should use a spreading angle.
Packet A simulated packet, can be transmitted using all types of transmission
RadioReceiver A radio omnidirectional reception device
RadioTransmitter A radio omnidirectional transmission device
WiredReceiver A wired receiver, is always assumed to be in range once connected.
WiredTransmitter A wired transmitter, is always assumed to be in range once connected.
 

Enum Summary
TransmissionType A type of transmission supported by a given transmission device.
 

Package ussr.comm Description

An abstract communications model comprising transmitters, receivers, and packets. Transmitters and receivers are organized into a hierarchy according to their types. The model is defined independently of the underlying physics engine.
